title: Overview of Quadrant System
text: Quadrant I consists points where $$x$$ and $$y$$ are greater than $$0$$. Quadrant II consists points where $$x>0$$ and $$y<0$$. Quadrant III consists points where $$x$$ and $$y$$ are less than $$0$$. Quadrant IV consists points where $$x>0$$ and $$y<0$$.

title: Determining Quadrant of $$(-4,2)$$
text: $$x=4>0$$ and $$y=-2<0$$. Following the details given in the previous step, the point is in quadrant IV.
